name: Roller Ball (itch)
description: Inspired by Super Monkey Ball, Roller Ball places you in elaborate multi-platform stages requiring you to collect gems to complete a level. Play through the tutorial to get acquainted with the controls, and then you're off! Roller Ball features 4 simple tutorial levels, and 23 primary levels. If you beat the hidden timer in each stage in Time Trial Mode, 4 additional special levels become available. Challenge your hand-eye coordination in this aesthetically pleasing 3D Puzzle Platformer, enjoy!
